SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:summary: Measures the acceleration force in m/s2 that is applied to a device on all three physical axes (x, y, and z), including the force of gravity.
Measures the ambient room temperature in degrees Celsius (°C). See note below.
SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:title: Ambient Temperature

SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:summary: Measures the force of gravity in m/s2 that is applied to a device on all three physical axes (x, y, z).
Measures a device's rate of rotation in rad/s around each of the three physical axes (x, y, and z).
Measures the ambient light level (illumination) in lx.
Measures the acceleration force in m/s2 that is applied to a device on all three physical axes (x, y, and z), excluding the force of gravity.
SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:title: Linear Acceleration

SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:summary: Measures the ambient geomagnetic field for all three physical axes (x, y, z) in μT.
SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:title: Magnetic Field

SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:summary: Measures degrees of rotation that a device makes around all three physical axes (x, y, z). As of API level 3 you can obtain the inclination matrix and rotation matrix for a device by using the gravity sensor and the geomagnetic field sensor in conjunction with the getRotationMatrix() method.
Measures the ambient air pressure in hPa or mbar.
Measures the proximity of an object in cm relative to the view screen of a device. This sensor is typically used to determine whether a handset is being held up to a person's ear.
Measures the relative ambient humidity in percent (%).
SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:title: Relative Humidity

SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:summary: Measures the orientation of a device by providing the three elements of the device's rotation vector.
SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:title: Rotation Vector

SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:summary: Measures the temperature of the device in degrees Celsius (°C). This sensor implementation varies across devices and this sensor was replaced with the TYPE_AMBIENT_TEMPERATURE sensor in API Level 14
